name: Street Racing
description: Illegal street racing reputation in the underground scene

description.heading: Rookie Racer
description.description: You're new to the street racing scene. Win some races to build your reputation.

description.heading: Known Driver
description.description: People are starting to recognize you at the starting line.

description.heading: Street Regular
description.description: You've become a regular in the street racing circuit.

unlocks.heading: Respected Racer
unlocks.description: Challengers seek you out for races.

description.heading: Underground Star
description.description: Your reputation precedes you in every underground meet.

unlocks.heading: Racing Elite
unlocks.description: Only the best dare to challenge you.

description.heading: Street Legend
description.description: Your name is feared on the streets. You are the one to beat.

unlocks.heading: Living Legend
unlocks.description: Stories of your victories spread across the city.
